original_title: En rang par deux (Un incontro con Aliou & Afif)
overview: The idea for the film comes from the encounter with two African boys who live in Rome, and is based ontheir music. In this film, midway between an interview and a music video, Tunisian Afif and Senegalese Aliou tell their different stories, talk about friendship, immigration, freedom and, above all, about the fundamental value of making music together.
title: En rang par deux (Un incontro con Aliou & Afif)
